EmailTemplate.name: 2019.12.06 - Whitespace - PROMO Email.PricePlan - PROMO Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}}, Your REWARD For Updating Your Plan
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
I just wanted to let you know that I have updated your account with your chosen price plan.
Included with this change is a 10% OFF promo code that can be used on your first purchase.
In case you missed it, here it is SAVE1912. You can use this promo code on almost anything but bottled water, services and printing.
Please note this code expires December 20, 2019.
To use your promo code make sure to sign in to your account at https://www.grandandtoy.com/Account/Logon <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/Account/Logon?cmp=PricePlan_PROMO&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
Best Regards, Sean Beauchemin Inside Account Manager 900 Belfast Road, Ottawa, ON K1G 0Z7 E-mail: seanbeauchemin@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:seanbeauchemin@grandandtoy.com]]> | Tel: 1-800-348-2184 Ext: 44170 Fax: 1-613-244-0765 Toll Free/Sans Frais Fax: 1-866-391-8555 Office Supplies | Cleaning & Breakroom | Interiors & Furniture | Technology | Print & Documents grandandtoy.com <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/?cmp=PricePlan_PROMO&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The content of this e-mail (and attachments, if any) is privileged and confidential, and intended solely for its designated recipient(s). Any dissemination, distribution or copying of this e-mail, other than by its intended recipient(s), is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail by error, please delete it and notify us immediately by reply e-mail.
